main event: A metallic, glowing saucer was seen on the ground near Dale, Indiana, on May 15, 1964, by two witnesses.
interesting points: The object was described as about 30 feet in diameter and 10 feet high., The saucer drifted to the ground slowly and took off silently after ten minutes., The incident drew national attention and was widely reported., The sighting was investigated by multiple agencies, including the Indianapolis Civil Defense., A hand-drawn sketch depicting burned areas and indentations was included in the report.
witness description: Charles Engelbrecht and his wife observed the object while on their porch.
